generic.last_encryption_date: last encryption date: {{ date }} by {{ name }}
generic.publishing_key: reminder: After publishing the key, it will take a couple of minutes for it to appear. Please just wait.
generic.type_seed: type or paste in your seed-phrase

success.reencrypted_secret_key: successfully re-encrypted secret key. It may take a couple of minutes for the changes to propagate. Refresh the group in 5 mins.

tips.additional_wallet: use this option to connect additional Qortal wallets you've already made, in order to login with them afterwards. You will need access to your backup JSON file in order to do so.
tips.digital_id: your wallet is like your digital ID on Qortal, and is how you will login to the Qortal User Interface. It holds your public address and the Qortal name you will eventually choose. Every transaction you make is linked to your ID, and this is where you manage all your QORT and other tradeable cryptocurrencies on Qortal.
tips.existing_account: already have a Qortal account? Enter your secret backup phrase here to access it. This phrase is one of the ways to recover your account.
tips.key_encrypt_admin: this key is to encrypt ADMIN related content. Only admins would see content encrypted with it.
tips.key_encrypt_group: this key is to encrypt GROUP related content. This is the only one used in this UI as of now. All group members will be able to see content encrypted with this key.
tips.new_account: creating an account means creating a new wallet and digital ID to start using Qortal. Once you have made your account, you can start doing things like obtaining some QORT, buying a name and avatar, publishing videos and blogs, and much more.
